name: AB Newswire
overview:
AB Newswire offers you a guaranteed minimum coverage across 150 specifically targeted news sites that are relevant to your niche. Their paid press release distribution service assures you maximum ROI and high value coverage across the widest range of premier media platforms. Their unique distribution features helps your releases reach out to your targeted markets.

Press release submission services from AB Newswire are unmatched in terms of getting your news and events better awareness and publicity. Unlike others, your releases get exposure to both online and offline media resources and at highly competitive prices. They also guarantee publication of your releases across 150 news websites and 150 news blogs.

Professionals in Public Relations, Media Management and related fields prefer using the services of AB Newswire because they offer an optimum and affordable way of gaining greater visibility to companies in both offline and online media platforms. They are the first choice of both medium and large organizations because they guarantee you a minimum coverage across 150 specifically targeted news sites relevant to your niche.
